# FadeEnvironmentCommand.FadeDirection

**Enumeration**

A value that represents the direction of the fade environment command.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FadeDirection
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **FadeEnvironmentCommand.FadeDirection.in**: A value that represents fading in of the environment backdrops.
- **FadeEnvironmentCommand.FadeDirection.out**: A value that represents fading out of the environment backdrops.
